resource_dependency.dashboard_layout_schema: Set up a database schema with tables: policies (policy_id, title, description, date_enacted, status, category), policy_analytics (policy_id, views_count, downloads_count), and policy_relations (policy_id, related_policy_id).

function: Display the main dashboard homepage showing an overview of regulatory policies.
static_description: The landing page features a lavender background with indigo-stoneworked UI elements. It includes a header bar with navigation links, a search bar, and a grid/list view toggle. Below this is a summary section presenting key metrics such as total number of policies, recently updated policies, and popular categories.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on 'View All Policies' navigates users to the full policy listing page. Clicking on any metric card expands it to show more detailed analytics.

resource_dependency.charting_library: Integrate Chart.js or D3.js for rendering interactive visualizations.
resource_dependency.data_visualization_schema: Database table named policy_analytics containing fields like policy_id, chart_type, data_points (JSON), labels (array), and timestamps.

function: Provide data visualization capabilities to represent complex regulatory policies visually.
static_description: A dedicated visualization panel displays various charts (bar graphs, pie charts, timelines) representing policy trends, compliance rates, jurisdiction distribution, etc., using indigo-themed chart components against a lavender backdrop.

interaction_and_states.description: Hovering over chart segments reveals tooltips with specific numerical data and contextual information about that segment.
Clicking on individual chart elements filters or highlights corresponding entries in associated lists or tables.

resource_dependency.policy_browsing_schema: Table policies with columns policy_id, title, description, date_enacted, status, category, and tags.
resource_dependency.pagination_config: Pagination settings for loading large datasets efficiently.

function: Enable users to browse through available regulatory policies easily.
static_description: Displays a scrollable list or grid of policy cards featuring titles, brief descriptions, enactment dates, statuses, and category tags. Each card uses indigo borders and lavender accents.

interaction_and_states.description: Endless scrolling loads additional policy items dynamically without refreshing the entire page.
Selecting a policy card navigates to its detailed view page.

resource_dependency.analysis_tools_schema: New table policy_analysis_tools with fields tool_id, name, description, and parameters_supported (JSON array).

function: Offer analytical tools to help users understand and interpret policy implications.
static_description: Presents a toolbar or sidebar with icons representing different analysis tools such as impact assessment calculators, comparison matrices, timeline builders, and risk evaluators—all styled with indigo-colored icons.

interaction_and_states.description: Activating an analysis tool opens a modal or side panel where users can configure inputs and run analyses based on selected policies.

resource_dependency.related_data_schema: Table policy_related_data linking policy_id to external sources, documents, citations, and multimedia assets via foreign keys.
resource_dependency.document_previewer: Integration with PDF.js or similar library for inline document previews.

function: Show supplementary data relevant to each displayed policy.
static_description: Each policy entry or detail view includes a collapsible section titled 'Related Data', which lists attached documents, external references, infographics, videos, and downloadable files using indigo headers.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the 'Expand' arrow under 'Related Data' reveals associated materials. Clicking on a file initiates preview or download depending on file type.

resource_dependency.interactive_charts_api: Chart.js or Plotly.js integrated with dynamic data binding.
resource_dependency.chart_data_endpoint: API endpoint returning structured data arrays and metadata for populating charts.

function: Render interactive charts and graphs for deeper insight into policy statistics.
static_description: Shows interactive line charts, bar graphs, heat maps, and bubble plots within dashboards or detail views. Charts use indigo lines/bars with lavender grid backgrounds.

interaction_and_states.description: Displays live data values when hovering over points or bars in the chart area.
Clicking legend items toggles visibility of respective data series. Clicking on chart regions drills down into subcategories or timeframes.
Allows dragging to zoom into specific areas of time-series charts or scatter plots.

resource_dependency.filter_options_schema: Database table filter_presets storing predefined filters including field names, operators, and values.

function: Allow filtering of policy listings based on customizable criteria.
static_description: Includes a collapsible filter panel positioned above the policy list/grid. Contains dropdowns, checkboxes, sliders, and date pickers for selecting categories, jurisdictions, enactment years, statuses, and keyword searches.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Apply Filters' updates the displayed policy set instantly. Clicking 'Reset Filters' clears current selections.
Adjusting any filter input automatically refreshes the results unless Apply is manually clicked.

resource_dependency.sort_fields_config: Pre-defined sorting options stored in app configuration mapping UI labels to database column names and sort directions.
resource_dependency.sortable_columns_schema: Ensure policy listing query supports ORDER BY clauses across multiple fields.

function: Permit reordering of policy listings according to user preferences.
static_description: Features a sort control dropdown near the top-right corner of the policy list/grid, allowing selection between sorting methods like Title A-Z, Date Enacted Descending, Status, Category Alphabetical, etc., rendered with indigo text.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting an option from the sort dropdown immediately reorders the displayed policies accordingly.

function: Style the landing page with a lavender background color.
static_description: Entire landing page has a solid lavender (#E6E6FA) background applied consistently across all sections except modals and overlays.

function: Apply indigo styling to UI elements throughout the application.
static_description: All buttons, form controls, tabs, navigation bars, and active states utilize indigo (#4B0082) as their primary accent color, creating visual consistency across the interface.

interaction_and_states.description: Buttons and interactive UI elements slightly lighten or darken upon hover while maintaining indigo tone.
Focused form elements gain an indigo outline for accessibility.

resource_dependency.search_api_endpoint: RESTful endpoint accepting GET requests with query parameters for full-text search and faceted filtering.

function: Implement a search functionality enabling quick lookup of policies by keywords.
static_description: At the top center of the dashboard, there is a prominent indigo-stoneworked search bar labeled 'Search Policies'. It contains a magnifying glass icon and placeholder text prompting users to enter keywords.

interaction_and_states.description: As the user types, predictive suggestions appear below the input box filtered by matching policy titles and descriptions.
Submitting the search term navigates to a new results page displaying matched policies.

resource_dependency.policy_detail_view_schema: Extend policies table with extended_description, legal_references, amendment_history, attachments (JSON array), and stakeholder_impact_report (URL).

function: Create detailed view pages for individual regulatory policies.
static_description: Dedicated pages for each policy feature comprehensive layouts showcasing the full title, abstract, effective dates, jurisdictional scope, amendments history, stakeholder impacts report, and embedded related media – all styled with lavender backgrounds and indigo headings.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on hyperlinked citations or cross-references takes users directly to referenced policies or external legal databases.

resource_dependency.export_formats_config: Support export formats including CSV, Excel (.xlsx), JSON, and PDF via server-side generation.

function: Enable exporting of policy-related data in standard formats.
static_description: Each policy listing and detail view includes a 'Download' or 'Export' button, represented by an indigo-stoneworked icon, offering choices like Export as CSV, Export to PDF, and Download Full Report.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting an export option generates the requested format and prompts browser download dialog or sends it via email if configured.

resource_dependency.auth_database_schema: Users table with user_id, username, password_hash, role, permissions_array, last_login, created_at. Roles table with role_id, role_name, permission_set (JSON).
resource_dependency.authentication_service: JWT-based auth system handling login/logout/session management securely.

function: Manage user authentication and enforce role-based access control.
static_description: Displays a secure login screen with indigo-stoneworked fields for username/password, branded logo, and 'Forgot Password?' link. Post-login, the dashboard adapts content visibility based on assigned roles (Admin, Analyst, Viewer).

interaction_and_states.description: Entering credentials and clicking 'Login' validates against the user database and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
Clicking profile menu > Logout invalidates session and returns user to login screen.

resource_dependency.responsive_framework: CSS media queries and Flexbox/Grid layout ensuring compatibility with mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints.
resource_dependency.device_testing_mandate: Test across Chrome DevTools device emulator presets and physical devices running iOS/Android.

function: Ensure seamless usability and layout adaptation across various screen sizes and devices.
static_description: Layout adjusts fluidly between stacked vertical arrangements on small screens and multi-column grids on larger ones. Navigation transforms into hamburger menus on phones, and font sizes scale appropriately with viewport dimensions.

interaction_and_states.description: Resizing the browser window triggers responsive adjustments in layout spacing, element stacking order, and font scaling.
Rotating a mobile/tablet device changes orientation and readjusts the layout accordingly.
